评论概述: Fashionable 2024 wide leg dress pants, comfortable
评论详情: I needed dress pants that were on trend and these are really nice. Shipping wrinkles came out nicely with ironing on low setting. The fabric is good quality, soft and drapes well. I wore them to an outdoor garden party in 90 degree weather and they were comfortable with dress sandals. I am 5’7” 160 pounds and these fit great. I really appreciate how well they launder! A bird pooped on one leg while I was seated and my spot-to-go tube removed the poop so not noticeable. At home, when laundered, I cannot tell where the spots were. Highly recommend these pretty pants.
true to size, very comfy!

These were really cute, however the zipper is insanely cheap. I bought two pair, one arrived with a broken zipper. The other pants zipper broke after two times of wearing it. The replacement I got for the first pair’s zipper broke too!! This is three times that the zipper broke, so it’s obviously not a fluke and just poor quality. It is disappointing because these are really cute.
The material is pretty good! It’s longer than my legs but I can easily tailor that. Definitely get it!
If you are 5’8” or taller - hard no! Looks ridiculous

评论概述: No difference between L and XL
评论详情: I'm typically a pant size 14 and I ordered size large first.  The style is nice but it was too tight. So I returned and instead ordered the XL.  It is literally the same size as the large, not bigger at all, so is still too tight on me. There is some stretch, but definitely not as stretchy as I was hoping.  I'm sure this would be nice for smaller sizes but it's crazy to me that the L and XL are literally the same size.  If you are plus sized I would not recommend.

I LOVE the quality, material and look!!  Going to buy another pair because these are perfect for work, dressy enough but so comfortable!!  True to size!  I am 5'6 & 161lbs, med. build and ordered a large.  They fit so good!

I needed a lightweight pair of slacks that weren’t overly casual. I can wear these to church with a nice blouse, and get many compliments! I bought two pairs of these and I’m thinking of getting more!
Great fit, great fabric, true Sizing. Love these pants will end up ordering in a second color
